import React from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import { Card, Dropdown, Button, Tab, Tabs, ListGroup, Row, Col, Table, Badge } from "react-bootstrap"; import FileUpload from "../FileUpload"; import "./ProjectSummaryDashboard.css"; const ProjectSummaryDashboard = (props) => { if (props.content.length === 0) { return ; } const statusType = { TO_DO: "To-Do", IN_PROGRESS: "In Progress", COMPLETED: "Completed", SUSPENDED: "Suspended", }; const project = props.content.filter((prj) => { return Number(props.id) === Number(prj.id); })[0]; console.log(project); return ( {project.client.fullName} Options View Edit Delete   + Add View Edit Delete   {/* TODOS: */} {/* ROLE OF BUTTONS? */}

{project.projectName}

Due By:{" "} {project.endDate.substring(0, 10)} {/* TODOS: */} {/* Start date or end date? */}     {statusType[project.status]}

{project.description}
Team Members:
  • {project.projectManager.firstName + " " + project.projectManager.lastName}{" "} Project Manager
    • {project.teamMembers .filter((tm) => tm.id !== project.projectManager.id) .map((tm) => { return
  • {tm.firstName + " " + tm.lastName}
    • ; })}
{/*
*/}

PROJECT SUMMARY

TOTAL HOURS

Non - Billable Hours 0.00

Non - Billable Expenses 0.00
); }; export default ProjectSummaryDashboard;
